itemLabel: Richard Harries, Baron Harries of Pentregarth
itemDescription: bishop of the Church of England

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Douglas Harries, Baron Harries of Pentregarth,  (born 2 June 1936) is a retired bishop of the Church of England and former British Army officer. He was the Bishop of Oxford from 1987 to 2006. From 2008 until 2012 he was the Gresham Professor of Divinity.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: * Richard Harries, Baron Harries of Pentregarth (born 1936), former Anglican Bishop of Oxford and broadcaster
*2006–present: Richard Harries, Baron Harries of Pentregarth, is an honorary professor of theology at King's College London, former Gresham Professor of Divinity and former Bishop of Oxford.
